name: Nivetha V
title: SQL Developer
tagline: Designing structured data solutions with clarity, performance, and precision.
about: I'm a dedicated SQL Developer experienced in building and managing relational databases. I understand both backend data structures and the frontend experiences they power. My focus is optimizing data flow, query performance, and transforming raw data into actionable insights. With a foundation in the MERN Stack and design tools like Figma and Flutterflow, I deliver systems that are both efficient and user-friendly.

bullets: Built and managed SQL Server databases using SSMS with focus on performance optimization
Designed normalized database schemas and wrote complex T-SQL queries for data retrieval
Created stored procedures and functions to automate business logic and data processing
Implemented indexing strategies that improved query performance by 40%
Collaborated in agile development workflows and delivered projects on schedule
Developed ETL processes for data migration and transformation tasks
Implemented data validation and integrity constraints for robust database systems
Developed responsive front-end features using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and jQuery
Created interactive user interfaces with smooth animations and transitions
Implemented cross-browser compatibility ensuring consistent user experience
Built reusable UI components that reduced development time by 30%
Created user flows and refined UI for clarity and responsiveness
Collaborated with design team to translate mockups into functional web pages
Designed and implemented relational database schemas with proper normalization
Created complex MySQL queries for data analysis and reporting requirements
Developed database triggers and procedures for automated data management
Optimized existing queries resulting in 25% faster data retrieval
Managed entity relationships and foreign key constraints for data integrity
Responded to user queries and supported application data needs efficiently
Created interactive UI prototypes in Flutterflow with modern design principles
Conducted user testing sessions and gathered feedback for design improvements
Designed wireframes and mockups for mobile and web applications
Implemented design systems and style guides for consistent branding
Collaborated with development team to ensure design feasibility
Created user journey maps and personas to enhance user experience

education.institution: Vels Institute of Science, Technology & Advanced Studies

certifications: Hands-on SSMS, SQL Queries & Azure Data Studio (Udemy) — Dec 2025
Mastering Power BI: From Data to Dashboard (Udemy) — Dec 2025
Data Analytics & Data Science using Python — Sep 2024
Full Stack Development Course (Skill India) — Sep 2024

projects.name: Data Insights Dashboard
projects.summary: Developed a complete data visualization and analysis dashboard that connects relational SQL databases with Power BI to extract actionable insights.

description: Designed normalized SQL database schema to store retail data (sales, products, customers, inventory).
Wrote complex SQL queries to compute KPIs such as total revenue, profit margin, and sales by region.
Integrated SQL dataset into Power BI to create dynamic dashboards with filters, drill-downs, and visual metrics.
Improved report refresh speed by optimizing queries and using indexed joins.
details.outcome: Provided a fully functional data visualization solution that demonstrates data aggregation, analysis, and storytelling using SQL and Power BI.

projects.name: Inventory Management System
projects.summary: Designed and developed a lightweight inventory tracking web application with real-time CRUD operations and database synchronization.

description: Built the backend API using Node.js and Express for managing stock levels, supplier data, and order flow.
Used SQL for structured inventory records and MongoDB for logs, ensuring hybrid data handling.
Developed responsive front-end UI in React, displaying stock analytics and alerts for low inventory.
Implemented secure API endpoints for adding, updating, and deleting product entries.
details.outcome: Streamlined product tracking and demonstrated ability to integrate relational data systems with modern full-stack architecture.

projects.name: Portfolio UI Concept
projects.summary: Created an interactive and futuristic developer portfolio prototype focused on motion design, clean hierarchy, and recruiter engagement.

description: Designed mobile-first, scroll-triggered interface inspired by Apple's motion principles.
Added animated components like glass cards, scroll progress, and interactive buttons.
Created responsive layouts and design tokens for light/dark themes.
Focused on accessibility and brand identity consistency for professional representation.
details.outcome: Showcased front-end design thinking and understanding of user experience flow for professional portfolios.
